Functions

Functionality related to Crystal challenges

Functions

(void) - CrystalSessionDelegate-p::challengeStartedWithGameConfig:
 Reports to the client that a challenge has been started from within the Crystal UI.On receiving this notification the client should instruct the user on the details of the challenge task and start the task. After completing the challenge task the client should inform the CrystalSession by calling postChallengeResultForLastChallenge:
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtChallenges
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'challenges' tab open.
(void) + CrystalSession::postChallengeResultForLastChallenge:withCrystalDialog:
 Post the result of the last challenge that the game was notified for.The game will be notified of the challenge via the challengeStartedWithGameConfig: method of CrystalSessionDelegate.
(BOOL) + CrystalSession::appWasStartedFromPendingChallenge
 Ask the session whether the application was started from an incoming challenge (push) notification.

Function Documentation

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtChallenges

Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'challenges' tab open.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (BOOL) appWasStartedFromPendingChallenge

Ask the session whether the application was started from an incoming challenge (push) notification.

Returns:
YES if the application was started from an incoming challenge
- (void) challengeStartedWithGameConfig: (NSString *)  gameConfig [optional, inherited]

Reports to the client that a challenge has been started from within the Crystal UI.On receiving this notification the client should instruct the user on the details of the challenge task and start the task. After completing the challenge task the client should inform the CrystalSession by calling postChallengeResultForLastChallenge:

Parameters:
gameConfigThe game configuration ID as shown in the Developer Dashboard
+ (void) postChallengeResultForLastChallenge: (double)  result
withCrystalDialog: (BOOL)  doDialog 

Post the result of the last challenge that the game was notified for.The game will be notified of the challenge via the challengeStartedWithGameConfig: method of CrystalSessionDelegate.

Parameters:
resultThe result of the challenge, either as a numerical value or as a number of seconds (NSTimeInterval) for time-based scores
doDialogIf YES Crystal will display a dialog over the game user interface
